column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=webanno.custom.Referent|entity|infstat
#T_RL=webanno.custom.Coref|type|BT_webanno.custom.Referent
#Text=Mike Halterman :
#Text=Do you feel there should be a happy ending for Nikki and Victor ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott : No , no , no to the happy ending !
#Text=If we languished in happiness for too long , it would be beyond boring .
#Text=Tension and conflict is the only way to keep characters interesting .
#Text=You may think you want them to be happy , but after a short time , the audience would want to see some fireworks again .
#Text=Mike Halterman : Your character went from stripper to socialite .
#Text=How do you feel this change deepened the facets of your character 's personality ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott :
#Text=Nikki went through a lot even before the stripper storyline .

#Text=In the first few months after I started , she killed her father in self-defense ( he had rape on his mind ) , joined a cult , and was a model for an agency that turned out to be a front for prostitution .
#Text=Beyond wayward ! Being a " socialite " never entered her mind , as she believed Victor was the butler when she fell in love with him .

#Text=The socialite aspect happened very slowly , but finding herself as the wife of Victor Newman , she had to learn how to present herself properly in this world that was 180 degrees from where she came from .
#Text=I think deep down she still feels unworthy of her position in life .
#Text=Mike Halterman :
#Text=How do you feel about being recognized not only in the U.S. , but abroad as well ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott :
#Text=It 's amazing .
#Text=One of the perks of being on such an internationally successful show has been traveling to other countries ( we are [ currently ] broadcast in 55 countries ) on the show 's behalf .
#Text=I 'll never forget the mind-boggling reception we received in Istanbul .
#Text=Journalists and film crews were actually on the tarmac as we disembarked the plane .
#Text=We kept looking behind us to see who they were waiting for .
#Text=Was Princess
#Text=Diana on the plane with us ?
#Text=No , they were there for us .
#Text=We have enjoyed similar receptions in Italy , Belgium , France , Monte Carlo , Canada , the Caribbean , and Australia , to name a few .
#Text=It 's given us very treasured memories .
#Text=Mike Halterman :
#Text=Some of your fans are new to the show , and others have watched since you first appeared in 1979 .
#Text=What would you like to say as an end note to all of your fans ?
#Text=Melody Thomas Scott : Thank you for your support !
#Text=Keep it up !
#Text=You are the only reason that we are thriving .
#Text=Thanks for having such good taste !
#Text=Questions asked to Michelle Stafford
#Text=Michelle Stafford on who really got Phyllis ' goat : " Christine by far .
